title: Podman 配置镜像加速
content:
### Podman 配置镜像加速
- 修改配置文件 `/etc/containers/registries.conf`，添加配置：

```yaml
unqualified-search-registries = ['docker.io', 'k8s.gcr.io', 'gcr.io', 'ghcr.io', 'quay.io']

[[registry]]
prefix = "docker.io"
insecure = true
location = "registry-1.docker.io"

[[registry.mirror]]
location = "https://<代理加速地址>"

[[registry]]
prefix = "k8s.gcr.io"
insecure = true
location = "k8s.gcr.io"

[[registry.mirror]]
location = "https://<代理加速地址>"

[[registry]]
prefix = "gcr.io"
insecure = true
location = "gcr.io"

[[registry.mirror]]
location = "https://<代理加速地址>"

[[registry]]
prefix = "ghcr.io"
insecure = true
location = "ghcr.io"

[[registry.mirror]]
location = "https://<代理加速地址>"

[[registry]]
prefix = "quay.io"
insecure = true
location = "quay.io"

[[registry.mirror]]
location = "https://<代理加速地址>"
```
